title: 820-4924 Fan spin
message:
820-4924

[B]Issue:[/B]
Fans Spin goes wild

[B]Troubleshoot:[/B]

[*]Changed SMC twice.
[*]Checked Thermal sensor (proximity Sensor/fin stack
[*]Checked Current sense resistors

title: 820-4924 Fan spin
message:
Do you mean the machine works, but fan spins at max?
If yes, fan starts at max from first second?
Run HWMonitor and post any strange value.
